name: FootballRosters
0:
”Alexa, ask Football Rosters who is the Bengals number 18?”
”Alexa, ask Football Rosters to set my opponents team to the Buccaneers”
”Alexa, ask Football Rosters, who is their number 3?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football rosters
des:
This skill can tell you a players name from their jersey number, useful for working out who that Defensive Tackle is who keeps wrecking the pocket.

Just say "Alexa, ask Football Rosters who is the Bengals number 97?" and Alexa will tell you it's Geno Atkins.

If you set your team by saying "Alexa, ask Football Rosters to set my team to the Patriots", you can then just ask "Alexa, ask Football Rosters who is our number 87?"

If you set your opponents team by saying "Alexa, ask Football Rosters to set my opponents team to the Steelers", you can then just ask "Alexa, ask Football Rosters who is their number 84?"

Perfect for game day!

This skill is completely unofficial and is not affiliated with the NFL.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
